S06n630:1: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-iha khalu suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna kvaciddharme carati |
S06n630:10: nāpi viparyāse vā abhūte vā caran bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
S06n630:17: ye ca na tathā yathā gṛhītāḥ,
S06n630:19: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāse vā abhūte vā carati |
S06n630:25: sā na śakyā ādarśayitum-iyaṃ vā bodhisattvacaryā,
S06n630:30: sarvacaryāvinivṛttaye hi bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti pṛthagjanacaryāvinivṛttaye śrāvakacaryāvinivṛtaye pratyekabuddhacaryāvinivṛttaye |
S06n630:32: teṣvapi bodhisattvā na caranti nābhiniviśante-ime vā te bodhisattvadharmāḥ,
S06n630:45: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmaḥ kalpo vā vikalpo vā |
S06n630:50: yo naiva ante na anante carati,
S06n630:52: madhyamapi suvikrāntavikrāmin samanupaśyan madhye caran anta eva carati |
S06n630:53: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin madhyasya kāciccaryā (vā kiṃci)
S06n630:56: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06n630:58: api tu yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06n630:60: sa sarvadharmān na bhāvayanna vibhāvayan bhāvanāsamatikrānto dharmasamatāmanuprāpnoti,
S06n630:65: vibhāvito hi sa mārgo na bhāvito na vibhāvitaḥ |
S06n630:71: sacetkhalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bhāvanā syādvibhāvanā vā,
S06n630:74: vibhāvaneti suvikrāntavikrāmin vigatā asyāṃ bhāvaneti vibhāvanā,
S06n630:82: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāso viparyāsaṃ samutthāpayati |
S06n630:99: sarvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin caryā sā caryāsamutthānā |
S06n630:106: acaryeti suvikrāntavikrāmin yanna kvaciddharme carati na vicarati na caryālakṣaṇaṃ saṃdarśayati,
S06n630:110: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06n630:117: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaścakṣurārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06n630:124: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:132: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāmarūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:142: parijñātā hi taiḥ sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca-abhūtaiṣā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ceti |
S06n630:143: yaiśca abhūtā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca jñātā,
S06n630:148: ye na suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ vā poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavotthāpakasamutthāpakakārakakārayitṛvedakavedayitṛsaṃjñāyāṃ jñātṛjñāpakasaṃjñāyāṃ carantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti |
S06n630:154: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā viparyāsairvā dṛṣṭigatairvā nīvaraṇairvā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:160: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pratītyasamutpādārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:164: yā ca parijñā pratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādārambaṇasya ca,
S06n630:167: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kāmadhātvārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:174: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:180: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:186: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā aviparyāsasamyakprahāṇasmṛtyupasthānāpramāṇārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:192: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā indriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānasamādhisamāpattyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:198: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:205: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā vidyāvimuktyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:211: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā anutpādārambaṇe vā kṣayārambaṇe vā anabhisaṃskārārambaṇe vā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:217: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:223: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:229: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:235: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇārambaṇe bodhisattvāścarantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām |
S06n630:241: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā lakṣaṇapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06n630:256: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi na carati |
S06n630:263: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na cakṣurārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06n630:269: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:274: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nāmarūpārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:279: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātmasattvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:284: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na jīvabhavapudgalakārakakārayitrutthāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitṛdraṣṭrārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:289: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:294: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nīvaraṇārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:297: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:300: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:303: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:306: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:309: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇaviśuddhapi carati |
S06n630:312: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāsaṅgāvaraṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:315: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nābhijñārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:318: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na sarvajñatārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati |
S06n630:325: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvārambaṇaprakṛtipariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ||
S06n630:326: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ idaṃ rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
S06n630:330: sa evaṃ rūpamasamanupaśyan na rūpamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06n630:340: sa evaṃ vijñānamasamanupaśyan na vijñānamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06n630:345: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamatītamiti carati,
S06n630:364: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasamudaye carati,
S06n630:390: sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin manyitāni spanditāni prapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni |
S06n630:395: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ sarvāṇyetāni manyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni jñātvā sarvājñānasamuddhātān na kaṃciddharmaṃ manyante,
S06n630:398: te anālayā asaṃyogā avisaṃyogā na kvacidutthāpayanti,
S06n630:400: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvamanyanāsamuddhātaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ||
S06n630:401: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati,
S06n630:416: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ etāni sarvāṇi vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni jñātvā sarvacaryāsamuddhātāya sarvacaryāparijñāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
S06n630:418: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantometadavocat-acintyeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā |
S06n630:460: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā,
S06n630:464: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā |
S06n630:468: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti |
S06n630:508: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ imānevaṃrūpānabhiniveśān sattvānāṃ viparyāsacittajān samanupaśyan na kvacidviparyāse cittamutpādayati |
S06n630:514: tatra bodhisattvo'pyārambaṇaṃ prajānannapi cittasyotpattiṃ prajānāti - kutaścittamutpadyate ?
S06n630:517: sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati |
S06n630:518: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham |
S06n630:519: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati |
S06n630:523: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06n630:531: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate-ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati,
S06n630:533: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-anuttareyaṃ caryā bhagavan bodhisattvasya yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
S06n630:534: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
S06n630:535: niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
S06n630:536: atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā |
S06n630:537: anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā punaḥ kaiścinnimittacaritairupalambhacaritairātmadṛṣṭibhiḥ sattvadṛṣṭibhirjīvadṛṣṭibhiḥ pudgaladṛṣṭibhirbhavadṛṣṭibhirvibhavadṛṣṭibhirucchedadṛṣṭibhiḥ śāścatadṛṣṭibhiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭibhiḥ skandhadṛṣṭibhirdhātudṛṣṭibhirāyatanadṛṣṭibhirbuddhadṛṣṭibhirdharmadṛṣṭibhiḥ saṃghadṛṣṭibhirnirvāṇadṛṣṭibhiḥ prāptasaṃprajñairvā adhimānikairvā rāgadveṣamohacaritairvā viparyāsacaritairvā utpathonmārgaprasthitairvā anākramaṇīyā |
S06n630:538: sarvalokābhyudayacaryeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā ||
S06n630:539: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat |
S06n630:540: anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā,
S06n630:546: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ caryā śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā abhaviṣyat,
S06n630:547: na teṣāṃ kaścidvyavahāro'bhaviṣyat-śrāvakayānīyā vā pratyekabuddhayānīyā veti |
S06n630:550: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā,
S06n630:551: tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti,
S06n630:555: evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
S06n630:556: anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena |
S06n630:557: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati,
S06n630:564: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti |
S06n630:565: tathāgatā api tān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatāniti viditvā prajñāpāramitābhūmyanuprāptāniti viditvā adhitiṣṭhanti caturvaiśāradyena |
S06n630:566: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam ||
S06n630:567: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam,
S06n630:570: teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:577: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:578: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:579: nocchedadṛṣṭiṃ na śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:583: va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:588: nānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ nābhisaṃskārajñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:590: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:591: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān (na bodhisattvadharmabuddhadharmān)
S06n630:593: na śamathaṃ na vidarśanāṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati |
S06n630:629: viparyāsasamutthitatayā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvā bhāvayanti ca vibhāvayanti ca |
S06n630:635: yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva evaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06n630:637: evaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati ||
S06n630:638: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na rūpasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate |
S06n630:664: so'nayā cittaviśuddhyā samanvāgataḥ sattvān maitryā spharati karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā |
S06n630:669: tasyaibhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati |
S06n630:670: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na rūpamupaiti, nopādatte |
S06n630:671: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān |
S06n630:674: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātumupaiti, nopādatte |
S06n630:686: nātmadhātuṃ na sattvadhātuṃ na dharmadhātumupaiti nopādatte |
S06n630:697: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kaściddharma upādātavyo nāpi kenacidupādattaḥ |
S06n630:709: udakacandrasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā agrāhyatāmupādāya indrāyudharaṅgasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā asatparikalpanatāmupādāya |
S06n630:712: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ sarvadharmān samanupaśyan na kaṃciddharmamupaiti nopādatte,
S06n630:715: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaśraddadhānatā anadhiṣṭhānatā anadhyavasānatā anabhiṣvaṅgatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
S06n630:716: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati ||
S06n630:717: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo na rūpe śikṣate,
S06n630:719: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu |
S06n630:720: na vijñāne śikṣate na vijñānasamatikramāya śikṣate |
S06n630:723: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
S06n630:730: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃkrāntaye śikṣate nāvakrāntaye,
S06n630:732: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpanityatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06n630:741: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpātītārambaṇe carati,
S06n630:749: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo'tītaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate-yadatītaṃ tacchūnyam,
S06n630:752: anāgataṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate-yadatītaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti |
S06n630:754: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate-yatpratyutpannaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti |
S06n630:756: atītaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06n630:758: anāgataṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06n630:760: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā veti,
S06n630:762: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati |
S06n630:763: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate |
S06n630:766: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamālambate,
S06n630:767: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06n630:810: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidgrahaṇaṃ saṃvidyate yatraiṣāmālambanaṃ bhaveta |
S06n630:829: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imānādīnavān saṃpaśyan na kaṃciddharmamālambate |
S06n630:831: sa nāpyudgrahāya nāgrahāya sthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tāmapi nirālambanavaśikatāṃ na manyate |
S06n630:832: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśate nābhivadati,
S06n630:834: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmālambanavisaṃyogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
S06n630:835: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūtiṃ gacchati |
S06n630:836: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ śaknoti kartum,
S06n630:840: na cāsya te'vatāraṃ labhante yatrāsya viheṭhān kuryuḥ,
S06n630:848: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na rūpavikalpanāyām |
S06n630:849: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na vikalpanāyām |
S06n630:851: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kalpayati na vikalpayati |
S06n630:876: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na buddhadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati |
S06n630:877: na pṛthagjanabhūmiṃ na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati |
S06n630:882: na muktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati |
S06n630:899: , tatra nāsti anto vā madhyaṃ vā |
S06n630:900: madhyamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpayataḥ sa evānto bhavati |
S06n630:904: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin na kalpanā na vikalpanā,
S06n630:908: anto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpo vikalpo vikalpasamutthitaḥ |
S06n630:920: yo duḥkhaṃ naiva kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06n630:923: sa evaṃ paśyan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati |
S06n630:926: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati |
S06n630:931: mārasya ca pāpīyasaḥ parājayaṃ karoti dhyāmīkaroti ca |
S06n630:967: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ ebhiścānyaiśca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ na paryantaḥ śakyo'dhigantum ||
S06n630:968: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nendriyavikalo bhavati |
S06n630:990: evaṃ ca mārasya pāpīyaso bhavati-atikrāntaviṣayo'yaṃ mama,
S06n630:996: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān śocati krandati paridevate-alpapakṣīkariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo māmiti |
S06n630:999: yasmiṃśca samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06n630:1003: mārāśca pāpīyāṃso duḥkhitā durmanaso bhavanti śokaśalyasamarpitā mahāśokaśalyaviddhāḥ-ativāhayiṣyatyayaṃ bata sattvānasmadviṣayāt,
S06n630:1013: imamarthavaśaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃpaśyantaste mārā duḥkhitā bhavanti durmanasaḥ śokaśalyaviddhāḥ |
S06n630:1014: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣo mahatā dhanaskandhena vipannena duḥkhito vedanātta(rta)
S06n630:1016: evameva māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito bhavati durmanā vipratisārī śokaśalyaviddhaḥ |
S06n630:1021: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ ekataḥ samāgamya cintayanti-kathaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
S06n630:1024: te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ |
S06n630:1026: na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā |
S06n630:1029: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ |
S06n630:1036: na ca śaknuvanti bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato'cchaṭāmātramapi cittasya mohanaṃ kartum,
S06n630:1043: te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamupasaṃkrameyurviheṭhābhiprāyāḥ |
S06n630:1044: te'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum |
S06n630:1046: tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati |
S06n630:1047: acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati |
S06n630:1048: tena taṃ na pratibalo bhavati māraḥ pāpīyānabhibhavitum |
S06n630:1053: ye'pi tāvatsuvikrāntavikrāmin bāhyā ṛṣayaścaturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06n630:1055: ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu sadevanikāyeṣu,
S06n630:1059: kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau |
S06n630:1060: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena |
S06n630:1061: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa,
S06n630:1063: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa,
S06n630:1067: niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,
S06n630:1070: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin niśrayaśca bhavati calitaṃ ca bhavati spanditaṃ ca bhavati prapañcanā (ca)
S06n630:1071: bhavati, te mārasya pāpīyaso vaśagatā bhavanti,
S06n630:1073: ye'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā niśrayādhyāsitāḥ,
S06n630:1078: ye vā punaranye'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ |
S06n630:1079: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ karoti,
S06n630:1081: yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati,
S06n630:1118: sa sarvadharmaiścāniśrito na calati na saṃcalati,
S06n630:1124: asya niśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate,
S06n630:1126: sarvaniśrayānamanyamāno'nupalabhamāno'nabhiniviśamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayamupaiti nopadiśati nābhinandati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati |
S06n630:1128: idaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaniśrayaviśuddhijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
